review: I had the pleasure of being treated by Dr. Yachna recently, and I must say that she is an amazing doctor. From the moment I met her, she made me feel comfortable and at ease. Her manner is impeccable, and she took the time to listen carefully to my concerns and symptoms before making a diagnosis. Dr. Yachna is clearly very knowledgeable in her field and kept up-to-date with the latest medical research and techniques. I was impressed with her expertise and the confidence she exuded throughout the appointment. What really stood out to me, however, was Dr. Yachna's friendly and cordial demeanor. She has a warm and approachable personality that makes it easy to discuss even the most sensitive medical issues. She showed genuine concern for my well-being and followed up with me after the appointment to ensure that I was on the path to recovery. Overall, I had an excellent experience with Dr. Yachna and would highly recommend her to anyone seeking a compassionate and skilled doctor.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
I went to Dr Grover to treat a yeast infection which had been recurring for over a year, despite consultation with multiple doctors.

Dr Grover explained the possible reason for it very clearly, looked at all my previous prescriptions and reports from other doctors before giving me a prescription for treatment. My infection was cured 100% and she asked me to come for a follow up to check recurrences, if any, every 3 months.

Not only was the treatment effective, but she was also really helpful with giving advice on how to prevent future occurrence, which have worked thus far. 

She was extremely patient, explained the reasons for prescribing medications clearly and answered all my queries at length.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
It has been a sheer pleasure to be able to rely on Dr Yachna Grover for all my concerns. She held my hand through things as a mother would and looked out for me and patiently answered all my questions regarding my health. Her clinic is a safe place to get to know your body well and to find the best medical treatment possible. I would like to extend my utmost gratitude to her for treating my physical health and along side, my emotional well-being as a strict priority and keeping me extensively in the loop about every step/treatment I was offered and undergoing. I strongly recommend Dr. Yachna to everyone who is seeking not only an ethical and extensively knowledgeable doctor but also, someone who would feel like family. 
Thank you again, Doctor! It always a pleasure to see you and I‚Äôm sure people do not feel that way about visiting clinics!

review: Dr. Yachna has been the kindest, most thorough, and patient doctor. She made me feel safe and heard, and took my concerns seriously without making me feel like I was 'overthinking' or alarmed. I've had a wonderful experience been treated by her, well, as wonderful as vaginal troubles can possibly be. Would also recommend for queer folks, Dr Yachna is very comfortable to talk openly and honestly with and creates an affirming and non-judgmental space for you. :)
